mmud.rest.services

Class GameBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • mmud.rest.services.GameBean

  • public class GameBean
extends java.lang.Object
    Gamebean takes care of all the game-related functions.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntityManager

        protected javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()
        Returns the entity manager of Hibernate/JPA. This is defined in build/web/WEB-INF/classes/META-INF/persistence.xml.
        Returns:
        EntityManager

      • createCharacter

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createCharacter(java.lang.String name,
                                        PrivatePerson person)
        Creates a new character, suitable for playing.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the user
        person - the data of the new character
        Throws:
        BAD_REQUEST - if an unexpected exception crops up.

      • logon

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response logon(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String lok)
        Logs a character in, to start playing.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        Throws:
        BAD_REQUEST - if an unexpected exception crops up.

      • play

        public PrivateDisplay play(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String lok,
                  java.lang.String command)
        Logs a character in, to start playing.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        Throws:
        BAD_REQUEST - if an unexpected exception crops up.

      • retrieveLog

        public PrivateLog retrieveLog(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String lok,
                     java.lang.Integer offset)
        Retrieves the log of a player.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        offset - the offset from whence to read the log
        Returns:
        returns the log
        Throws:
        BAD_REQUEST - if an unexpected exception crops up.
        See Also:
        PrivateLog

        Stops a playing character from playing.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        Throws:
        BAD_REQUEST - if an unexpected exception crops up.
